name: Impacket Lateralization Detection
query: ((process.parent.executable:(/.*\\[Ww][Mm][Ii][Pp][Rr][Vv][Ss][Ee]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Mm][Mm][Cc]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Ee][Xx][Pp][Ll][Oo][Rr][Ee][Rr]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Ss][Ee][Rr][Vv][Ii][Cc][Ee][Ss]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/) AND process.command_line:/.*[Cc][Mm][Dd]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee].*/ AND process.command_line:/.*\/[Qq].*/ AND process.command_line:/.*\/[Cc].*/ AND process.command_line:/.*\\\\127\.0\.0\.1\\.*/ AND process.command_line:/.*\&1.*/) OR (process.parent.command_line:(/.*[Ss][Vv][Cc][Hh][Oo][Ss][Tt]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]\ \-[Kk]\ [Nn][Ee][Tt][Ss][Vv][Cc][Ss].*/ OR /.*[Tt][Aa][Ss][Kk][Ee][Nn][Gg]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee].*/) AND process.command_line:/.*[Cc][Mm][Dd]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee].*/ AND process.command_line:/.*\/[Cc].*/ AND process.command_line:/.*[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Tt][Ee][Mm][Pp]\\.*/ AND process.command_line:/.*\&1.*/))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`((process.parent.executable:(*\\wmiprvse.exe OR *\\mmc.exe OR *\\explorer.exe OR *\\services.exe) AND process.command_line:*cmd.exe* AND process.command_line:*\/Q* AND process.command_line:*\/c* AND process.command_line:*\\\\127.0.0.1\\* AND process.command_line:*&1*) OR (process.parent.command_line:(*svchost.exe\ \-k\ netsvcs* OR *taskeng.exe*) AND process.command_line:*cmd.exe* AND process.command_line:*\/C* AND process.command_line:*Windows\\Temp\\* AND process.command_line:*&1*))`
